definition: to do/to manage/to handle/to play with/to fool with/to mess with/to fix/to toy with

sentences.english: Don't play with the pointer when not using it.
sentences.chinese: 當你不使用教鞭時，不要舞弄它。

sentences.english: The mother was dancing the baby on her knee.
sentences.chinese: 那位母親在膝上上下舞弄逗樂嬰兒。

sentences.english: But see, the false pen of the scribes has made it false.
sentences.chinese: 看哪，文士的假筆舞弄虛假。

definition: to move as in a dance/to wave (some implement)/to flourish/(of eyes, hands etc) to dance/to flutter
to tease/to make fun of/to provoke/to stir up (trouble)
to flutter/to dance in the breeze
to play with/to engage in/to resort to/to dally with
to move back and forward/to trade
to fly up/to dance in the air (of snowflakes, flower petals etc)
to sway gently (as in the wind)/(of a flame) to flicker
showy boxing of no practical use/see 花拳繡腿|花拳绣腿
